commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Advisory Group on the Food Chain and Animal and Plant Health#E00860#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=860#Not a member#C#Working Group on Plant Health#Working Group on Seeds and Propagating Material#Consultation Forum on Access and benefit sharing (ABS)#E03396#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3396#Member#C
goals__remit: CIOPORA is the international association of breeders of vegetitavely reproduced ornamental and fruit varieties. Top priority of CIOPORA is the constant development and enhancement of systems of Intellectual Property protection for plant innovation, which include Plant Breeders' Rights, Patents, Plant Patents and Trademarks.
